clinical_note: "Day 1: Severe hyperglycemia (Glucose 355.4 mg/dL). Monitor for DKA. Continue insulin, hydration. BP/HR stable; SpO2 normal. No fever." (24 words)
Day 2: Persistent hyperglycemia (glucose 293.7). BP, SpO2, Temp, HR within normal limits. Monitor glucose, adjust insulin regimen. (24 words)
Day 3: Glucose elevated at 335.5 mg/dL; other vitals stable. Hyperglycemia noted. Plan: Continue insulin, monitor glucose. *(20 words)*
"Day 4: Persistent hyperglycemia (glucose 175.5 mg/dL). BP, HR, SpO2, Temp stable. Monitor glucose control; consider insulin adjustment. No acute instability noted." (24 words)
Persistent hyperglycemia (glucose 275.3), day 5. Monitor BG, adjust insulin. Other vitals stable.
"Day 6: Elevated glucose (197.7 mg/dL). Monitor glycemic control. Discharge in 2 days." (16 words)
Day 7: Persistent hyperglycemia (glucose 237.8 mg/dL); monitor glycemic control. Other vitals stable.
Day 8: Critical hyperglycemia (Glucose 327.8); other vitals stable (BP 121/75, SpO2 97%, Temp 36.9Â°C, HR 63). (19 words)
